Action:
Optional.
Supported values: Add; Edit; Remove.

Optional.
Supported values: Enabled; Paused; Removed.

Required on create.
Supported values (Add): Search; Display; Video.
Supported values (Edit): Unknown; Search; Display; Shopping; Video; App; Smart; Hotel.

Optional.
Supported values: Google search; Search partners; Display Network; YouTube search; YouTube videos.

Optional.
Supported values: Daily; Campaign Total; Monthly.

Required on create.
Supported values (Add): CPC (enhanced); Manual CPC; cpc; Viewable CPM; cpm; CPA (target); Maximize clicks; Target ROAS; Target CPA; Maximize Conversions; Maximize Conversion Value; Manual CPV; cpv; Target CPM; CPC%; Target Impression Share; Commission; Invalid; Target Position.

Optional.

Optional.
